data.text: Have fun in the sun this summer, plan your vacation now! Start booking at midnight via http://t.co/FWTKzvrjmU http://t.co/nkY5GUwRHm
RT @Patee122: We apologize at any delays. It could be because of weather, technicals, .. We don't delay unless we… http://t.co/IXRhFznezr
Be ready to smile. Nok Fan Club membership can book this offer from May 15 – May 25 14 at http://t.co/IhVnAdc3hA http://t.co/3xGB5MLwCE
Explore Chiang Khong, the gateway to Laos, Vietnam and China, with our new Fly'n'Ride service. http://t.co/aI5UPXpS6y http://t.co/eBKA34vDsL
As of 16:34 Vibhavadi Rangsit has been opened
Phaholyothin Road or Srisaman intersection to local roads. Passengers are advised to leave 2-3 hours ahead of their flight. 2/3
Passengers flying out of Bangkok are advised to avoid Viphavadi  Rd. and Toll Way (inbound) and advised to take Toll Way (outbound), 1/2
Passengers flying out of Bangkok are advised to allow extra time and use the tollway today due to demonstrations.
Due to demonstrations, passengers flying out of Don Mueang International Airport are advised to leave extra early due to traffic congestion.
@eyuiz Thank you very much, we will pass this on to our customer care and let them investigate. Hope you have a great weekend ahead :)
@eyuiz Thank you for letting us know, could we please have your booking number so we can investigate this further? Thank you.
We are proud to help those affected from earthquake in Chaing Rai to visit their family or manage repairs. http://t.co/0iks5N76re
RT @simpliflying: Nok Air being mentioned as an example of an airline with new Q400 at #IATS @patee122 @ ICAO http://t.co/0YFSlifddX
Start booking from today! Nok Air new promotion "Pack and Go" starting at 990 THB. Book now at http://t.co/nhfFsyPG2H http://t.co/s2vzKlkPaM
Pack and Go with Nok Air's special fare starting at 990 THB! Start booking from 6 May 2014 at http://t.co/nhfFsyPG2H http://t.co/gd9x5QNPjK
Heading back to #Bangkok from #UdonThani on our newest bird, NOK PETCHNAAMNGERN #avgeek http://t.co/SYNwmZ1GBP
Bikes are packed and ready to fly backto Bangkok on Nok Air #Udonthani #Bangkok #Thailand http://t.co/XU8MjHcsTX
Good morning #Udonthani thank you for the great energy at #NokAirConcert last night!
RT @RichardBarrow: Good to see that Chiang Mai has started to have dedicated bike lanes (Pic @popeyee27) #Thailand #Travel http://t.co/5WRq…
Boy Peacemaker gets the crowd going with his hit song "Change" at #NokAirConcert #Udonthani http://t.co/IP2fjBvz16
Boy Peacemaker is the last performer at #NokAirConcert and the crowd is still going strong! #Udonthani http://t.co/A3A0NBFErS
Everybody's up and dancing with ETC! #NokAirConcert #Udonthani http://t.co/gYz6kRsU5j
Th #NokAirConcert continues with hit band ETC taking the stage #Udonthani http://t.co/GoGUGtNJgV
Lipta defying gravity! #nokairconcert #udonthani http://t.co/oROEIvbAMw
Duo Lipta is giving #UdonThani a real treat tonight. So many good songs and jokes with the crowd at #NokAirConcert http://t.co/ixMPWh6eIG
RT @Patee122: Thank you Udonthani for singing "Happy Birthday" to DD @mynameisbe http://t.co/DkSNyQPUqd
The show continues with Lipta taking the stage and a very excited crowd. #NokAirConcert #Udonthani is rockin'! http://t.co/G5KbReq09g
@travelefante yes, that's what everyone was screaming :)
Hit after hit, Dome Pakorn keeps the crowd in Udon Thani screaming nonstop #NokAirConcert http://t.co/qxBfNsopUs
The #NokAirConcert stage in Udon Thani just got hotter thanks to Dome Pakorn #Thailand #Udonthani http://t.co/un1JxbaQbH
Heartthrob rocker Dome Pakorn Lam takes the stage after PP Project and the girls go crazh #NokAirConcert http://t.co/e6UTvMJ2B5
@Patee122 giving out free Nok Air tickets to some lucky audience members at #NokAirConcert http://t.co/naEc2eTTHB
Udon Thani is rockin' tonight with Nok Air CEO @Patee122 at #NokAirConcert http://t.co/aDcKjG3gSp
@Patee122 And PP Project rocks out at Nok Air Concert in Udon Thani #NokAirConcert http://t.co/8SP8JRaGsF
The #NokAirConcert begins! PP Project is about to open and rock the show. #Thailand http://t.co/91nq91sWgK
RT @Patee122: We are ready!! @ สนามทุ่งศรีเมือง จ.อุดรธานี http://t.co/xLWBDg1SUY
The #NokAirConcert is about to begin! Drop by our Nok Air activity booths to win some great prizes! #Thailand http://t.co/P3YbLKATat
Not only is the view at Rabieng Patchanee nice, but so is the food. Highly recommended in Udon Thani. #foodie http://t.co/W01TL1ni7S
Rabieng Patchanee for dinner this evening, woth a view of Nong Prachak #Thailand #Udonthani http://t.co/j09Ky9Qqhi
Lunch time at "Som Tum Soi Benjang" delicious papaya salad, fried chicken, and grilled fish.. And more! http://t.co/H12JnfgdDl
Nakha Market in Udon Thani is the place to shop for traditional crafts and textiles #Thailand #Udonthani http://t.co/PhVCC6WEGu
The group then cycles to Wat Phothisomphon and pays makes merit at the Buddha Relics Stupa. #Travel #Thailand http://t.co/SBYbNnk2RP
A look inside the Moral Museum at the Chinese Cultural Center in Udon Thani #Travel #Thailand http://t.co/1Ef9WEWyii
The beautiful grounds of the Chinese Cultural Center in Udon Thani. http://t.co/9a9tvugZei
We stop and pay respect to the Chaopu – Chaoya Chinese Spirit Shrine at the Chinese Cultural Center http://t.co/7sLLFait1L
We stop and pay respect to the Chaopu – Chaoya Chinese Spirit Shrine at the Chinese Cultural Center http://t.co/EM64cqghqV
Starting off in front of the the Monument of Krommaluang Prachaksinlapakhom
A quick stop to pay respects at the Monument of Krommaluang Prachaksinlapakhom http://t.co/ly8aDtvxyC
Let's explore Udon Thani! #nokair #Thailand http://t.co/6K8ad0QFlN
Provincial Governor of Udon Thani on stage with Nok Air executive and Guests to kick off the 121km ride http://t.co/18RR5LSmyR
Opening ceremony for the 121 Year Anniversary of Udon Thani begins with provincial officials and guests. http://t.co/de0eavjHR0
Gathering at the city square for a welcoming ceremony by Udon Thani officials before we set off for our ride http://t.co/sqwT5LBps7
Nok Air executives are ready to set off for a biking tour of Udon Thani to celebrate its 121st Anniversary http://t.co/oI6OyEPcPd
The stage for Nok Air's concert is getting ready to rock Udon Thani tomorrow! #Thailand #Udonthani http://t.co/QEepVcQLCW
After dinner, our Bike Finder friends reassemble their bikes before we start our 7am ride through Udon Thani http://t.co/f44OaJeKgo
Soup with ant eggs is a local favorite here. Who wants to try? #Thailand #Udonthani #foodie http://t.co/V9xwBROUMl
We're at Krua Khun Nid, a local hotspot in Udon Thani for dinner. http://t.co/8bKKXoHmJZ
RT @RichardBarrow: View of the setting sun from our restaurant in Ranong. Across the river is Myanmar #Thailand #Travel http://t.co/SLWTXiV…
The sun sets behind us as we depart the airport heading towards the city center of Udon Thani. http://t.co/Tbov1ssL0A
@FHavg @9vska you guys know us too well. And isn't eating good food a major part of traveling? Besides, beed fill up before biking tmrw :)
@RichardBarrow_ yes, full sized bikes fly for free, in addition to the 15kg free luggage on Nok Air.
Arrived in Udon Thani. All the bikes are unloaded with care. Travel with your bike.. Bikes fly free :) http://t.co/dpA2zpuOQN
@FHavg just landed, but wifi on board us coming soon :)
@chokdeesmith @richardbarrow we definitely take good care of all luggage and goods :)
@RichardBarrow You can buy the bag from http://t.co/QBgFOHNkGz or visit their shop in Bangkok. Ask for khun Somchat.
Nom nom nom... Nok Kanom inflight snack from Bangkok to Udon Thani. Just enough to prepare us for delish Isaan food http://t.co/8u0lj96pir
#BikeFinder, Life Cycling, and Cycling Plus are all checked in and ready to bike together in Udon Thani tmrw http://t.co/vR3uhcrApM
Lots of bikes flying to Udon Thani today. Celebrate Udon's 121st Anniversary this weekend at Non Air's concert. http://t.co/1RWP4qC0Yr
On our way to Udon Thani for a cycling tour of the city. Bring your bike with Nok Air, free of charge :) http://t.co/Sb8Zf4u0Vh
RT @RichardBarrow: I have arrived safely at Ranong Airport. The Nok Air flight arrived ten minutes ahead of schedule http://t.co/iRTDa0l8sb
RT @RichardBarrow: Northeastern #Thailand has some breathtaking scenery. These rock formations are in Na Tan district, Ubon Ratchathani htt…
Book and Pay Nok Air ticket at the Counter Service and get discount 200 THB! Read more http://t.co/YNCLUfvfEK http://t.co/G9FYJ2wDQY
This Friday we'll be in Udon Thani for the Nok Air concert on Saturday. Don't miss out on this exciting concert! http://t.co/oAWXrCD4H1
RT @Patee122: See you Udon on Saturday http://t.co/QJlQDs7N1I
JIBjib, Nok Air's in-flight magazine's new issue will take you to Nakhon Phanom. Available in-flight 1 May onwards. http://t.co/dpOSxMpqO0
@GizielLima Glad to hear that, we look forward to welcoming you onboard Giziel :)
Do you have what it takes to be a NokScoot pilot? Visit now! http://t.co/Mk12CQTtB3 http://t.co/y0BrHZwoEG
Nok Air has partnered with the TAT, Kasikorn Credit card and Voyage Travel Magazine.More info http://t.co/q8l2azGcvO http://t.co/LpGrtDt0QC
Tone Nga Chang Waterfall, one of the most beautiful and famous waterfalls of both Songkhla and the South. http://t.co/foYVnu9PhJ
@inspiredlyfit Great photo, thanks for sharing!
RT @RichardBarrow: Admission for Tha Pom Khlong Song Nam is 50B/30B for foreigners & 30B/10B for Thais #Thailand #Travel http://t.co/jkAeF4…
@ArtieDivin1 You can check in online 24 hours before your flight :)

Are you planning a trip for Holiday ? Check out "Happy Holiday" starting from 990 THB at http://t.co/1QTCXFkhbi  
http://t.co/jPV1aMSPgE
Hi @ArtieDivin1 it would be best for you to check in online through http://t.co/2RPwzopPEl before your flight.
Due to fire safety drills at Nakhon Si Thammarat Airport, flights out of the airport are expected to face some delays.
RT @RichardBarrow: Too many beautiful islands for one trip. Must come again - RT @BEAUTIFULPlCS: Hong Island in Krabi http://t.co/Cjtsy2GzS…
RT @RichardBarrow: Looking down on the sand bank on Tup Island (เกาะทับ) with Chicken Island (เกาะไก่) in the background Krabi #Thailand ht…

Separated Sea, one of Krabi's wonders
Let's go to the South with Nok Air! Book now at http://t.co/eAINQYHtiN http://t.co/dhRhdkaRjk
@ckwilson Hi Tez, our logo is actually a bird's beak :) "Nok" means Bird in Thai.
If you're flying to Udon Thani with Nok Air, you can win 2 nights at Hop INN Hotel for free! http://t.co/ZZiNlxjGHI http://t.co/vs6mFKIIFU

Raksawarin Hot Spring at Ranong
"TAT-Nok Air Let's go South Thailand" promotion. Book now at http://t.co/eAINQYHtiN http://t.co/FJklAocxhT
@FlyAsiaCo Unfortunately at the moment there is no newsletter available in English, but all promotions are posted with banners on FB and tw
Hello Sunday! Enjoy this great view at Koh Payam, Ranong. http://t.co/qtCdPJynfk
@FlyAsiaCo Hi Brad, for English update on promotion, please follow us on twitter or Facebook at http://t.co/RJfd16XiIH :)

Traveller's paradise at Krabi. Promotion "TAT-Nok Air Let's go South Thailand" Book now at http://t.co/T9cOgygar2 
http://t.co/rEXSsQhutT
The sun sets at the Fisherman's Village, in Chumphon. http://t.co/sG09RRins8

Book now! Promotion "TAT-Nok Air Let's go South Thailand" Starting at 1090 THB. More info at http://t.co/eAINQYHtiN 
http://t.co/xEYF0u9u32
@Dieprince Hope you enjoy your first time to Krabi!
@passagensaereas Thank you very much for your review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the flight and our services.
Thanks @bambicorro we are very happy to hear that our fun planes can make you laugh, that is our goal after all :)
